attributes.action: Discuss the great efforts of Captain Tom Moore in his fund raising efforts.
attributes.additional_details: I would love the Cabinet, in the absence of our Prime Minister, to discuss the proposal of Knighting Captain Moore over the coming months. I am sure the Great British public would support this.
attributes.background: So far Captain Moore has raised over £12 million and his efforts have been heroic. His dignity throughout has been inspiring and a lesson can be learnt by all of his juniors throughout the UK. I would like the Government to further recognise his efforts publically.

rejection.details:
We know lots of people want to petition for Colonel Moore to receive an honour, but the Government will only accept individual nominations, not petitions, so we can’t publish your petition.

To submit a nomination for an honour, visit: http://www.gov.uk/honours/
